name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX 3060 GPU, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and 144Hz refresh rate display.

name: Tablet
description: 10.5-inch tablet with stylus support, 128GB storage, and 10-hour battery life.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Lightweight fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life.

name: 4K Smart TV
description: 55-inch 4K UHD Smart TV with HDR and built-in streaming apps.

name: DSLR Camera
description: 24.2MP DSLR camera with 18-55mm lens, 4K video, and Wi-Fi connectivity.

name: External SSD
description: 1TB external SSD with USB-C connectivity and 1050MB/s transfer speeds.

name: Wireless Charger
description: 15W fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable keys and wrist rest.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision gaming mouse with 16000 DPI and programmable buttons.

name: Action Camera
description: 4K action camera with waterproof case, image stabilization, and voice control.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Central control for all your smart home devices with voice assistant integration.

name: Robot Vacuum
description: Smart robot vacuum with laser mapping, app control, and self-charging.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive VR experience with 110-degree field of view and motion controllers.
